name: Freezing Blast
description: sweeps forward damaging enemies within for 77 - 115 + 96% Weapon Damage. Any of your Ice within the effect is converted to Frigid Ice.\n\nFrigid Ice harms enemies within 5m over time Dazing them and inflicting 57 - 86 + 70% Weapon Damage. Enemies destroy it on contact taking 201 - 301 + 251% Weapon Damage, becoming Rooted and suffering Ice Buildup. Tripping it again while afflicted with Ice Buildup causes Knockdown.
